title: Compass

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, learn who a redirected player visited last night.
- During the night, redirect a player to a random target. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn everyone who was redirected/controlled last night.
- Roleblock immunity when redirecting a player.

desc:
Post 3073
*DISCLAIMER- Will not lead you to any bitches*
